argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | asclmul1.a | |- A = ( algSc ` W ) |
| 2 |  | asclmul1.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 3 |  | asclmul1.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 4 |  | asclmul1.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 5 |  | asclmul1.t | |- .X. = ( .r ` W ) |
| 6 |  | asclmul1.s | |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` W ) = ( 1r ` W ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 | #P_asclval | |- ( R e. K -> ( A ` R ) = ( R .x. ( 1r ` W ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) -> ( A ` R ) = ( R .x. ( 1r ` W ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) -> ( X .X. ( A ` R ) ) = ( X .X. ( R .x. ( 1r ` W ) ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) -> W e. AssAlg ) |

| 14 |  | #P_assaring | |- ( W e. AssAlg -> W e. Ring ) |

| 16 | 4, 7 | #P_ringidcl | |- ( W e. Ring -> ( 1r ` W ) e. V ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_syl | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) -> ( 1r ` W ) e. V ) |
| 18 | 4, 2, 3, 6, 5 | #P_assaassr | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ ( R e. K /\ X e. V /\ ( 1r ` W ) e. V ) ) -> ( X .X. ( R .x. ( 1r ` W ) ) ) = ( R .x. ( X .X. ( 1r ` W ) ) ) ) |
| 19 | 11, 12, 13, 17, 18 | #P_syl13anc | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) -> ( X .X. ( R .x. ( 1r ` W ) ) ) = ( R .x. ( X .X. ( 1r ` W ) ) ) ) |
| 20 | 4, 5, 7 | #P_ringridm | |- ( ( W e. Ring /\ X e. V ) -> ( X .X. ( 1r ` W ) ) = X ) |
| 21 | 15, 13, 20 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) -> ( X .X. ( 1r ` W ) ) = X ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) -> ( R .x. ( X .X. ( 1r ` W ) ) ) = ( R .x. X ) ) |
| 23 | 10, 19, 22 | #P_3eqtrd | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) -> ( X .X. ( A ` R ) ) = ( R .x. X ) ) |
